title: Egyptian Fintech Startup Zeal Secures $4 Million to Fund Expansion to New Markets
description: The Egyptian fintech startup has revealed that it recently raised $4 million in funding via a round led by venture capital firms Raed Ventures and Cur8 Capital. CEO said the firm’s capital raise is expected to help Zeal accelerate its journey “towards utilizing AI to revolutionize retail customer engagement on a global scale.” Enterprise Investment […]

title: Nancy Rademaker Charts the Future of AI in Keynote Speech at Pendulum Summit
description: Renowned tech expert, Nancy Rademaker, delivered a captivating keynote speech at the prestigious Pendulum Summit in Dublin, where she offered valuable insights into the future of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Rademaker, an authority in digital transformation, shared a four-step strategy for businesses, particularly those in Ireland, to effectively harness the power of AI for staying competitive. […]

title: Unstoppable Domains and Push Protocol introduce token-gated messaging
description: Unstoppable Domains, a leading Web3 domain name provider, has partnered with Push Protocol, a decentralized messaging protocol. This collaboration aims to introduce a new messaging platform, “Unstoppable Messaging,” designed to combat misinformation and scams in the crypto space. title: South Korea mulls over crypto tax abolition amid financial investment tax repeal
description: South Korea is currently deliberating on whether to include gains from cryptocurrency assets in the upcoming abolition of income tax on financial investments. In a policy briefing earlier this week, Jeong Jung-hoon, the deputy minister of South Korea’s Ministry of…
